TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDatabaseCreator

summary.para: Creates and deletes databases for a given database provider.
This interface is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanConnect() cil managed

summary.para: Determines whether or not the database is available and can be connected to.
Note that being able to connect to the database does not mean that it is up-to-date with regard to schema creation, etc.

Docs.returns: True if the database is available; false otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<bool> CanConnectAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

Docs.param: A to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

summary.para: Determines whether or not the database is available and can be connected to.
Note that being able to connect to the database does not mean that it is up-to-date with regard to schema creation, etc.

Docs.returns: True if the database is available; false otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool EnsureCreated() cil managed

Docs.summary: Ensures that the database for the context exists. If it exists, no action is taken. If it does not exist then the database and all its schema are created. If the database exists, then no effort is made to ensure it is compatible with the model for this context.
Docs.returns: True if the database is created, false if it already existed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<bool> EnsureCreatedAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

Docs.param: A to observe while waiting for the task to complete.
Docs.summary: Asynchronously ensures that the database for the context exists. If it exists, no action is taken. If it does not exist then the database and all its schema are created. If the database exists, then no effort is made to ensure it is compatible with the model for this context.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous save operation. The task result contains true if the database is created, false if it already existed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool EnsureDeleted() cil managed

summary.para: Ensures that the database for the context does not exist. If it does not exist, no action is taken. If it does exist then the database is deleted.
Warning: The entire database is deleted an no effort is made to remove just the database objects that are used by the model for this context.

Docs.returns: True if the database is deleted, false if it did not exist.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<bool> EnsureDeletedAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

Docs.param: A to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

summary.para: Asynchronously ensures that the database for the context does not exist. If it does not exist, no action is taken. If it does exist then the database is deleted.
Warning: The entire database is deleted an no effort is made to remove just the database objects that are used by the model for this context.

Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous save operation. The task result contains true if the database is deleted, false if it did not exist.
